summary: I WAS DRIVING TO WORK I TRY TO CHANGE MY MUSIC AND TRY TO USE MY TEMPERATURE CONTROL PANEL THE SCREEN WAS FROZEN NOT DOING ANYTHING I WAS NOT EVEN ABLE TO HANG UP A PHONE CALL FROM THE SCREEN, AFTER WORK MY CAR WAS COMPLETELY OUT OF POWER DID NOT TURN ON AT ALL, IT HAS A RECALL S55 THIS IS THE SECOND TIME THAT THIS EXACT THING HAPPEN TO ME, FIRST TIME THEY FIX IT WITH NO PROBLEM, NO THIS TIME THEY ARE SAYING THAT IT IS PROBABLY THE RECALL AND SOMETHING ELSE, I DON'T WANT TO PAY MORE TO FIX IT ITS ALREADY 4 TIMES HAVING TROUBLE WITH THIS CAR I'M TIRED OF IT MY MONTHLY PAYMENT IS BIG AND NOW "SOMETHING ELSE" THAT THE WARRANTY DON'T COVER?? I THING THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH THE DEALERSHIP, IF THEY SEE THAT YOU DON'T HAVE WARRANTY ANYMORE THEY TRY TO GET MORE MONEY FROM THE CUSTOMER.
